Blue-fronted Amazon

Amazons Central & South America

A popular Amazon species, characterized by a patch of blue or turquoise on their forehead. The amount of blue varies greatly between individuals.

Datos R치pidos

Tama침o

14-15 inches (35.5-38 cm). Weight: 400-500g (14-17.5 oz)

Peso Promedio

450 g

Nivel de Ruido

Loud. While maybe not as intense as the Yellow-naped, they can and will scream to get attention or express excitement.

Origen

Central & South America

Temperamento y Personalidad

Playful, intelligent, and can be very affectionate. They are known for being relatively 'mellow' for an Amazon but can still be stubborn and strong-willed.

Vocalizaci칩n y Capacidad de Habla

Very good talkers and can mimic a wide range of sounds. They have clear, human-like voices.

Dieta y Alimentaci칩n

An obesity-prone species. Their diet should consist of pellets, a wide array of fresh vegetables, and very limited high-sugar fruits and high-fat nuts.

Salud y Longevidad

Can live 50-80 years with proper care. Keep an eye on weight gain. Also susceptible to respiratory infections and sinus problems if not kept in a clean environment.

Alojamiento

Requires a large space. A minimum cage size of 36"W x 24"D x 48"H is recommended. Not a good choice for apartment dwellers due to noise.
